summary:
Adds a new lore friendly armor set based on tsun's armor to the game
Male and Female version - CBBE -
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description[/heading]
Adds a new Armor set to the game
-craftable under steel section
-Stats are the same as Steel Armor just weighs less

if you like this mod also check my other mod
[Url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45679/?]Armor Workshop[/url]

[heading]Installation[/heading]
just copy the files to you Data folder and check the .esp in the launcher
also make sure you have your game updated to the newest version (1.9)


[heading]Other Stuff/ Permissions[/heading]
please report any issues, bugs or other stuff you find
feel free to comment and upload images as feedback, suggestions and bad your-mama-jokes are highly appreciated=)
also feel free to do with this mod whatever you like and if you happen to like to add or fix something yourself just contact me.
author: testiger2
